column2: Has NOT broken free from being a Foederati in 30 years

In exchange for §R50% of your income, 30% of your troop reinforcement rate and [GetChineseOffmapTributaryPrestigeCost]§! you will receive §Ga regiment of Chinese troops you can raise when you are the defender in a war (unless against another tributary of [offmap_china.GetShortName]) and 2 grace per month§!.\nThese effects last until you declare a §Ywar for independence§! or when your suzerain is weak and you §Ydeclare your independence via a decision§! in the intrigue screen.\n
